text: Hazageno Jisasi'a zamagrikura anage hu'ne, Aravema hute'ma kenaku eme atruma hu'naza vahe'mo'za, aravema husia ne'ma zamagranema mani'nesige'za zamasunkura osugahaze, tamagefi? Hu'neanagi mago kna ne'eankiza aravema hunaku'ma hania nera, zamagripintira avaretrete'za, anante zamagra ne'zana a'o hugahaze.
